Task: What is the biggest ?
Result:

output:
The biggest dog breed in the world is the Mastiff, with male Mastiffs typically weighing between 160 to 230 pounds. Other large dog breeds include the Boerboel, Tosa inu, and Saint Bernard. The Great Dane is also recognized as one of the largest breeds in terms of height. If you are looking for a massive dog, the Mastiff is a top contender in terms of size and weight.

For more information, you can refer to the Google search results on the largest dog breeds in the world:
- [23 largest dog breeds in the world](https://www.google.com/search?q=biggest+dog+breed+in+the+world)
